characters.name: Homer
characters.dialogue:
Bart! Doh I've been stabbed. 
 Homer dies on the floor. Go find help, Ned's house is across the street.

characters.name: Ned
characters.dialogue:
Hi didly ho Bart! Homers dead? Oh no! I knew my satan sense was tingling. I did see someone walking towards the Power Plant down the street. 
 Investigate the Power Plant using the car in the Simpsons driveway. Homer keeps his car keys in the dining room.

characters.name: Smithers
characters.dialogue:
Hello Bart. What are you doing here? What?....Homers dead? Oh no! Mr.Burns must know something about this, he has hated Homer ever since he got here.

 Maybe u can sneak into his office to find some clues. You can probably find keys to his office in the janitors closet

characters.name: Apu
characters.dialogue: Hi bart, welcome to my store, before i talk to you, you must buy an item

characters.name: Sideshow Bob
characters.dialogue: HEY BART GET BACK OVER HERE
